choices: You try to break your door open.
You decide to go on your Xbox for a while.
You go back to bed.
An 8ft blonde haired 10 year old barges in. "Hey, bro!" she giggles...
Something else
1.content:
"-and the time right now is twenty past seven in the morning! If you're hearing this right now, you must be an early bird!"
You groan and roll over, slamming the Snooze button on your alarm clock and cutting the slightly crackled voice short. A ray of light is shining through your window, the beautiful light of a new day, even if it is just a boring, regular old Friday morning. But something immediately seems off: where has your bed gone? You're currently lying on a mattress on the ground. Wait, your carpet is a slightly different shade of beige. Had your mum somehow changed the carpet whilst you were sleeping? You pinch yourself to check you're not dreaming, but with no success. You're awake.

Slightly confused, you rise from the mattress on the ground, rubbing your tired eyes. You attempt to open your bedroom door but it won't budge. Something strange is definitely going on. Why had you been locked in your bedroom? Maybe the door is just jammed? You try to open it more forcefully but still with no success. You didn't want to wake your dad by yelling through your door, you're already grounded for playing a prank on your little brother.
You approach your computer desk to grab your phone and maybe text Sam, but it's nowhere to be found. Maybe your brother had taken it again without asking. But just then, you notice something on the floor. You pick it up and examine it... it's a slipper. A pink, fluffy slipper. The sort of thing your mum might wear. But something is odd about it... it's really quite big, bigger than your feet. Maybe your mum was tidying your room for you like she sometimes does and left it in here by accident. You look at the shoe size inside it... it says "6 (F)". What was the "F" for? It could mean female, but as far as you know, the same foot size system is used for males and females. And it looks a lot bigger than a 6...
1.title: Something's off...

choices: You tell your mother you would like to stay and meet Emma
You Tell your mother you would rather go to school
You tell your mother you would like to arrange a date with Amy
You tell your mother you would like to arrange a date with Josephine
Other
11.content:
You begin to pound on the locked door and notice that it seems unusually large, then it clicks...

The door opens and your mum Jane comes in, you’re astonished as she is nearly 20 ft tall. “someone must be very eager to clean mommies toes” she says, she looks down at you and notices her giant pink slipper, “Hey I was looking for my other slipper this morning, I guess I left it in here last night, thankyou for keeping an eye on it for me” she says as she winks at you. you are still in shock and awe at your mothers massive size, and hardly say a word as she puts on her other slipper and motions you down the hall and into a living room. She sits on an enormous grey sofa and kicks off her fluffy pink slippers. Then before you can do anything she smothers you with her massive feet... Her feet push you to the ground and each foot is atleast 3&1/2ft (a meter long) long her toes cover your face... shocked you protest and ask what is going on.
“It’s not that bad! You usually like cleaning my feet once I get out of the shower” you feel the humidity coming off your mothers feet “ besides I am not in the mood for back talk, we do this every day and now you decide to make a fuss!” She says sternly; you stay there under her soles against the white shag carpet as she begins to talk “ I’d like to go over our schedule, as you know I’m having my friend Emma over for dinner, Emma told me she wanted to see you after I bragged about your good behavior, but I may have to take it back after the fuss you made this morning, you can either go to school and clean once you get home, or You can help mommy Clean here and I can have Emma come here Early” She goes on talking “It’s very important that you get out and meet people I’ve heard Amy is a nice tall girl with good values, and that Josephine is too besides her habit of shrinking and eating every man she meets” she says “make sure to lick between my toes, this is an important lesson, Pretty soon I’m going to have to give you away, I’ve talked about giving you to Emma for the weekend, or if there’s a girl your into let me know” you continue begrudgingly to lick your mothers feet as your 10 ft tall younger sister walks in”she asks if she needs to take you to school
11.title: You try to break your door open.

choices: They play footsie with each other until dinner
Something happens between footsie and dinner
Something else
111.content:
After hearing this your mother turns to your sister and says “I think it would be best if Guy stays here today and gets some real experience, besides this will give him a chance to make up for the fuss he made this morning.”

*Sister leaves out the door for school”

After your sister leaves your mother lifts her feet a little but still has your legs pinned beneath her heels you look up at her smiling face past her toes
“I am very proud of you for choosing to stay here and help me, most of the work has already been done but I would like you to clean my flats, my good sandals, and some of my other good shoes before Emma gets here, Then I was hoping we could work on some of your manners before I give you to Emma for the weekend, You know she is much more forgiving than most women especially torwards you, but she won’t tolerate disobedience and you know she has a thing for shrinking”

Your mother picks her feet up and slides them into her pink fluffy slippers then she picks you up and carries down the hall to a shoe closet and drops you down into a pile of massive shoes “ there’s a sponge if you need it, I’m going to call Emma she will probably get here around 10:00 or 11:00”

Your mother leaves the room and you think about what she said shrinking?, eating?, giving you away?, you cannot believe this is all happening! You decide to clean her shoes somewhat worried about the consequences of refusing to do so. You clean the sole, thong and straps of your mothers sandals and get to work on her flats, they have a semi-sweet smell to them that’s almost hypnotic, as you are cleaning the soft insides of her flats you hear the doorbell ring

Your mother rushes over to the shoe basket and tries to slide into her flats with you partially inside them you shout “ Hey!” “Oops!, sorry sweetie Emma’s at the door and I’m in a hurry” as she waves her foot over the basket she slides into an old pair of Birkenstocks picks you up in her arms and rushes to the door.
As she opens the door you see a colossal Emma who was noticeably taller than your mother they hug each other smothering you with their chests, and then they came in and they sit on the grey sofa, your mother sets you down, and you notice your mother prepared some tea, and coffee cake that is sitting on top of the coffee table.
You’re underneath the coffee table as Emma kicks off her flats and begins rubbing her feet around the carpet near you, you realize she is trying to play a game with you as the air underneath the coffee table fills with the semi-sweet aroma, she pins you to the ground with her massive feet that are at least 4&1/2ft (1.3 meters) and you can hear her giggle with satisfaction as she wins this little footsie game; you kinda enjoy having her sweet smelling feet on top of you and giving her that satisfaction, she scrunches her toes to play with you, as she goes on talking with your mother
“I was thinking about giving guy to you for the weekend, he needs some experience in how to be an obedient little man, and in the different tasks in pleasing a women” your mum says
“Sounds fun! And I’ve been wanting a little man to play with for some time, I don’t think guy will have a problem with disobedience, he hasn’t stopped cleaning my toes since I’ve gotten here” Emma says
They both look under the table to see you pinned underneath Emma’s right foot
“Oh that’s so good to see him doing what he’s supposed to without being told if only he would be like this all the time! I’m going to call Anita and see if she wants to come over for dinner, I’ll be right back!”

Emma turns to you and hands you a small piece of coffee cake, picks you up and sets you on her massive lap as she crosses her legs and begins to talk to you “so where you having fun down there?” As she glances at your boxers and wiggles her toes for you to see, “maybe... your feet are well kept and have a sweet aroma” you say not trying to sound taboo
“I think so too, you don’t have to be shy around me, I could tell you were enjoying yourself” she says as she smirks at you, you are in something of an awkward silence before she talks “You haven’t gotten around to my other foot, and I will probably have you play with my feet all this weekend”
She drops you down and smothers you with her left foot your mother comes in and says Anita will come here for dinner after work, Emma and your mother play footsie with each other and pass you between their feet for a while, giggling to themselves and chatting.
111.title: You tell your mother you would like to stay and...

choices: Shrink a little man!
Have $ex!
Other
1111.content:
Your mum and Emma continue to play footsie and continue to try and grab you with their feet and toes they continue this for several hours as they chat and drink tea, eventually your younger sister Sarah gets home and goes straight to her room to watch tv;.

Some time later your mum gets up to start preparing dinner, leaving you and Emma alone. “I’m having such a great time, I can’t believe I am going to have you all to myself this weekend!” She says as she pins you underneath her right foot and then wiggles her toes in satisfaction “phew, all that footplay has made my feet really sweaty, I will probably have you clean them once We get home, but can you start licking my toes now” you look up at the soft sweaty aromatic soles that are pinning you too the carpet and begin to kiss and lick them.

Around this time Anita comes home exhausted from work and gives all the girls hugs and greets them, she says hello to you and that she’d missed you but not much else, she sits on the couch and kicks off her high heels letting out a strong sweet foot odor as Emma slides you from underneath her feet to underneath Anita’s feet “Thanks Guy I’ve had the longest week of work and I’ve been dying to have a little man to work on my feet, if you could rub on them to that would be awesome” Anita said as you leaned into her arch with your shoulder trying to please her; you hear Anita moan in satisfaction as Emma slides back into her flats.

Then your mum comes in to let you all you all know that dinner is ready you get to the table to see a massive chicken with rolls and green beans, everyone sits down, except you as there was no place at the table, you politely ask your mum if you could sit at the table “Little men hardly ever get a seat at the table unless if they’re on it” she said with a laugh, “but since you’ve been so good cleaning my shoes and entertaining our guests I guess we could let you tonight” she runs off and comes back with a massive high chair and sits you between Sarah and Anita,

Sarah protests “ why do we have to have Guy at the table, he’s a boy and he smells like feet!” Your mum bursts in saying “ Guy has been very good today and tended to all of our toes and cleaned my shoes, it’s just natural he would smell like sweaty feet and some girls like the smell, so could you just put up with it for tonight” your sister backs off but she still despised the fact you’re at the table. you got a small portion of chicken and had to eat it with your hands as forks were to heavy, as Sarah was passing you the butter she purposely spilled it on you “oops! Sorry “ she said in a bratty tone your mum was fine with your sister treating you badly but wasting food and causing a fuss at the table weren’t ok, she told Sarah to go to her room as she stomped off in a defiant rage “ Your never going to be anything more than a foot boy!” she said as she left the table you were still drenched in warm butter.

” Anita could you clean guy off” your mum said as Anita moaned some clearly still exhausted from her job, Emma perked up and took you too the kitchen sink instead of washing you with water she got out her tongue and proceeded to lick you up and down you were somewhat afraid but you didn’t think she’d eat you. she sucked your legs and feet most of all, licking your feet and toes as her lips engulfed your legs, then she licked you up and down and sucked your area until she was sure you had came, all the while she moaned with pleasure as She proceeded to taste you, “mmmm, you do smell like feet she said” there was a pause “hope I didn’t scare you too bad I hope you know I wasn’t going to eat you, well unless if you wanted me to”, she giggles at the thought “I just wanted to lick the butter and foot smell off of you, this can be our secret” Emma says winking at you

She brings you back to the table and sets you down your mum looks at you suspiciously, before continuing dinner you finish dinner and your Mum, Anita and Emma keep chatting for a while, eventually Anita and Emma have to go, Your mum tells you to be good and to remember Emma can do anything She wants with you over the weekend. Emma takes you and puts you in the passenger seat of her black Chevrolet Suburban you look out your window to see massive skyscrapers as you leave your small suburb and drive about 30 minutes into the city. Eventually you pull into a parking garage and go up an elevator to the upper penthouse of the building, you look to see a large kitchen with an island, massive windows with a living room and shag carpet, huge flat screen tv and on the deck was an above ground swimming pool, you look up to see a modern chandelier and the ceiling even at your small size appears to be eighty feet up even when compared to Emma’s above average height. Emma strolls by as you marvel at her amazing penthouse, Emma sprawls out on the couch and looks at the time,10:00-Friday, She kicks off her flats and lets her feet air out as she appears to enjoy the smell, picking up her flats to press her nose into them and inhale, she turns to you and says “we don’t have a lot of Time to do anything today, we can do one thing today before I have to go to bed” she says thinking suddenly she perks up “I’ve always wanted to
1111.title: They play footsie with each other until dinner

choices: Hands
Feet
Somewhere else?
1112.content:
Your mum and Emma continue to play footsie with you in the middle. You often thought your mum had nice feet but never in your life did you imagine you being sandwiched in between them but here you are. You started licking their feet every time you were being passed around, often tried to clean in between her toes and underneath her toenails, there was only a bit of dirt in either of their feet but you felt it since you’re down there you might as well worship them with your tongue.

“I think guy has a natural affinity to be a foot toy, he’s so warm and cuddly. Look he’s been licking our feet the whole time” Emma says cheerfully

“ even though he started a bit problematic this morning I am glad he is doing the right thing, maybe it’s you Emma, you’ve always had a way with men with your feet.” Replies your mum

“ No of course not, it’s probably because of your and Sarah’s training, All those years of worshipping both your feet must have really prepared him to worship other girls feet.”

“Your probably right, I want him to grow up like his father, submissive and faithful” your mum says

“Ah speaking you guys dad how is he?” Emma asks

“”Oh you know he still worships my feet often after a stressful days work and we often “play around” together. yesterday he asked me if he could have some freedom, I said ok and let him”. You knew when she meant playing around she meant sex.

“So you let him go?” Emma asks

“Of course not, all I did was shrunk him down to minuscule proportion and let him explore my soles and toe nails. I do sometimes bring him outside but only when he is shrunken so small, you can’t even see him. I really don’t want him to get hurt by other girls, some of them are not as kind as me” your mum says.

“How small did you shrunk him?” Emma asks

“He said my nails looked like continents and my the ridges on my soles looked like mountains” your mum says

“I didn’t know you could shrink people that tiny, you must have practised a lot. You would have felt so much power when you shrunk him” Emma says

“Of course, I felt like a goddess, just thinking about how my body is like a world to him or how any movement I make could be his last” your mum says.

“ that would be amazing, to shrink people that tiny” Emma says.

“It’s easy just concentrate on shrinking, even if you get a slight headache after because you pushed yourself, it’s worth it.” Your mums says.

“Would be nice if I could practise with someone” Emma says.

“ why don’t you use guy over here?” Hearing this you stop worshiping your mothers feet for a moment.

“Don’t I get a say in this?” You ask

“No honey you don’t, we will decide if you’re shrunken or not and if we want to we can also crush you like a bug” she says while clamping you in between her feet. To put into perspective the height difference between you and your mother, you barely reach her knees and her foot could almost cover your entire torso . Emma on the other hand was even taller and could cover your entire torso with her foot and you were an 3 inches underneath her knees.

“ don’t question your mothers decisions, besides it will be fun” Emma replies looking under the coffee table.

“Wait shrinking ? What are you guys even talking about?”

“We are talking about shrinking you honey. What you thought we were talking about Emma or you’re little sister? Don’t be silly women can’t be shrunken. Oh by the way my left foot is feeling a bit jealous of all the attention you give to my right. There we go right in between my toes, you know all the good spots, don’t forget the nails.” You couldn’t believe what was being said, shrunken how is that even possible?

Your mum passes you to Emma’s toes via her feet once your done worshipping your mums soles and you start to clean Emma’s beautiful toes, one by one, hypnotised by the smell and taste. You lick each of her perfectly cut and pedicured nails, making sure not a spot is left.

In the middle of licking you ask “ even if I am shrunken how will I even survive ?”

Emma replies “you can survive being shrunken, depends on the mood of the one shrinking , if they’re in a bad mood or you made them angry, well you can say goodbye to your life. Besides stop trying to stall being shrunk, it’s good training for you to serve women.”

Your mother says “reminds me of the Jones boy that lived next door, made his sister angry by just walking in on her taking a shower, they shrunk him to minuscule propositions and made him live on her toe nail for two years”

“What happened to him after two years?” You say

“It hasn’t been two years yet” she says in a terrifying tone.

“Just another reason to not oppose your mothers wishes guy” Emma says while cuddling you with her feet, “of course your a good foot pet aren’t you?”

“Ye-yeah I am” You say while kissing Emma’s feet.

“But I am really still unsure of how shrinking works, it sounds pretty dangerous.”

“You’ve been asking some weirdly obvious questions, haven’t you guy? You know shrinking works because, Anita used to always shrink you when you were a kid!” Your mother says.

“Yeah but that was a long time ago and I don’t remember?” You try and come with an excuse, hoping your mother would accept the excuse

“I suppose so, it’s been a year and a half since she shrunk you, but I guess I’ll explain it to you ‘mr I don’t remember’. All females are born with the ability to shrink any man they please, you can be shrunken to any size but the female who shrunk you knows where you are at until she returns you to your normal size . If they forget they shrunk you, you will just grow back up slowly. However like the jones boy a female can shrink you and keep you at that size as long as she pleases or until she forgets your existence. Now as I said a female can shrink you as small as she wants but after shrinking a man after a certain point they get a slight head ache and if they continue the head ache persists but it’s easily manageable without even a painkiller. One last thing a woman can shrink multiple men and keep them shrunken until they forget they exist. That’s everything you need to know of shrinking. Now I would like a reward for my hard work” she says while wiggling her beautiful toes.

“Gladly” you say and proceed to suck on her big toe and second toe like a lollipop,which fills you entire mouth.

“Good boy” she says in a warm manner.

“So when should we do it?” Emma ask excitedly.

“How about now?” Your mother says

“Now there is one problem where should we shrink him?”

“We better shrink him on our bodies so he’s close to us, don’t want him to get killed yet”your mother says

“That’s true” Emma says

You stop licking and is now worried for your life.

“We were kidding guy, of course we couldn’t kill you, your way too fun as a foot toy.” She says while ruffling your hair with her huge toes.

“ so have you decide Emma ?” your mum asks

“No, I haven’t but I’ll let guy choose where he should be shrunken. As a reward for his hard work” says Emma

“So where do you want to be shrunken?” Asks your mother looking under the coffee table.
1112.title: Something happens between footsie and dinner

You thought for a while until you said “feet“while hugging your mothers feet.
Your mother then picked you up from under the coffee table and put you on the sofa in which she was sitting.

you noticed how large normal Objects looked, for example your feet didn’t even touch the sofa on the ground or that the coffee mugs were much larger. You guessed that it was to build for usability by females and felt like a child compared to your mother and Emma.

“You said feet but whose?” Emma asks

111221.content:
“Hmmmmmmmm” you said out loud as both your mum and Emma looked eagerly to who would be able to play with you. Finally you said “I would like to be shrunk on my mothers foot.” Your mothers anxious face turned into one of excitement and relief.

Meanwhile Emma wore a face of clear disappointment, you felt sorry for her

“Don’t worry Emma, I’ll play with your beautiful feet all weekend” you say

“It’s a promise?” She says enthusiastically.

“It’s a promise” you say and like that Emma’s warm smile came back.

“So guy, which part of the feet do you wanna be shrunken on?” your mother says rubbing her feet on the ground.

choices: You’re dying to be in Josephine’s stomach ;)
You want to help earn a few bucks at a local place or toy boy store
You don’t want to end up in some stranger’s stomach and want someone you know
114.content:
Your mum gives you a somewhat confused look before turning to your 10 ft tall little sister and tells her it’s best if she hurries to school...

Your mum turns to you and says “ you made a fuss over my morning pedicure, and now you’re wanting to be swallowed alive by Josephine! You’re acting a tad strange today.”

”-she pauses as she lifts her feet just enough to see you past her toes-

She sighed and went on talking “ If you’re just dying to be in Josephine’s stomach” -she giggles at this statement- “then I can make that happen, but if you just want to be eaten you could help me earn some extra cash and let me turn you in at one of the local restaurants, or toy-boy-stores; they’re always looking for little guys like you, and with shrunken males being the latest fad cuisine I may get up to 30£-60$“ she said eagerly!

“Or if you didn’t want to end up in some stranger’s stomach I could give you to my friend Emma because she had been wanting to see you, but she’d be thrilled if she got a taste of you! I could also give you off to Anita she’s so busy with her job that she hardly has time to cook and would enjoy something she didn’t have to cook and could eat on the go!”-your mum scrunches her toes giving way to a wavy wrinkled sole-“ Or if I was really greedy I could eat you myself with my jasmine rice and noodles at lunch” she says eagerly. You hear her moan” mmmm” at the thought of it. she turns down to you to see your response
114.title: The talk

choices: Selling you to the toy-boy store
Selling you to a local restaurant
Auctioning you off online
1142.content:
You tell your mum that you’d like to earn her some cash and get sold to a local restaurant or toy boy store. Your eager mum begins grabbing at you with her toes as she begins to talk “that’s such a great choice you’ll finally be able to earn me some money, and with shrunken boys being the latest fad foodie item there isn’t a better time to do it” your mum eagerly says.

she pauses as she pulls out her massive smart phone, that is about half as long as your body, and you hear the sound of her typing away on her smart phone keyboard. “I need to do a little research to see where I can turn you in to get the highest profit” as types she toys with you at her feet, rolling you back and forward between her feet

“Ok so it says that the toy-boy-store will give out 15£-30$ for a boy, but keep in mind you would be stuck on a shelf until some girl decided to buy you, and then you’ll belong to her she may not decide to eat you but most boys there get eaten as they are considered cheaper”

she continues toying with you and prodding you with her toes as she continues talking
“there are a few local restaurants that are buying boys most notably yummy boy, a fancy sushi and asian food place, known for boy sushi and rice; Samantha’s restaurant, a lovely establishment with blends of European and Mediterranean quisine,thats Emmas favorite because she loved getting shrunken boys as an appetizer or with her pasta; then there is Hannah’s escape which I have never been to but it says its a fun bar where girls can take a load off snack, and party” she pauses “they’re all saying they will pay up to 30£-60$ for a boy” your mum says as she stops prodding you with her toes and continues to type on her phone


“One final thing I didn’t think of was that I could auction you off on auction.com, but I don’t think I would make as much money that way.” Your mum lifts her feet And scrunches her soles as she looks down at you to see where you want to be sold to.
1142.title: Where to be sold

choices: Eaten at yummy boy
Eaten at Samantha’s restaurant  or Hannah’s restaurant
11422.content:
You tell your mum that you would like to be sold off to a local restaurant, with great alacrity your mum lifts her feet off of you and slides into her pink fluffy slippers picks you up and heads down the hall and into her room.

She sets you on the bed as she changes into a dress and begins talking to you “ If you could try to shine my platform shoes while you listen to me that would be great,” you look beside you on the bed to see a pair of chork platform shoes and begin trying to clean them as your mum continues talking “I am trying to get a little dressed up before i go out, have you given any thought to which restaurant you want to be eaten at?”

You pause for a moment as you’re mum gets her cork platforms and slides into them, sitting right next to you on the bed as she fiddles with the straps around her toes, you practically fall into her lap as she disrupts the bed. She looks at her gleaming toes as she picks you up and places you in the massive passenger side of her massive suburban. She turns to you one last time and says “so where do you want to be eaten, yummy boy, Samantha’s, or Hannah’s; if you don’t make up your mind soon I’ll decide who’ll be eating you!” Your mum says annoyed as she licks her lips
11422.title: Where to be an entree

choices: Hannah’s underground escape
Samantha’s restaurant
114222.content:
You think in your mind for a brief second and say your trying to decide between Hannah’s bar, and Samantha’s restaurant. Your mum sighed “I don’t see why I give you all these decisions, your just a boy and you are just going to wind up in some girl’s stomach before Saturday morning” she said to herself. She stopped at an intersection and she began “well at least those two restaurants are in the same part of town, so it will give you some time to think”.

you looked out the window to see strip-malls, salons, spas, restaurants, clothing stores, super markets and the large skyscrapers downtown. as you made your way to the strip mall that contained Samantha’s, and Hannah’s.

You turn and look to see Samantha’s was a large restaurant with a prominent position in the strip mall, it had an odd architecture reminiscent of the Mediterranean, with columns, a terra-cotta roof, tall high windows, and clay exterior. Then you turned to the more secretive Hannah’s underground escape bar, which had no windows and was only noted by a blue LED-sign pointing down a flight of stairs that boldly read “Hannah’s underground escape” with a subtitle “where a girl can relax” Your mum pulled into the large parking lot as she turned to you to make your final decision.
114222.title: Decisions decisions

choices: Get eaten by your mum over rice
Get eaten by Anita at work
Get eaten by Emma when she comes over
1143.content:
“I can certainly see why you wouldn’t want to be eaten by a total stranger!” Your mum says as she slides into her pink slippers, she lifts you up off the carpet and places you next to her on the couch

“So do you want me to give you too Emma, Anita, or do you want me to eat you” your mum giggles some as you stand there dazed, “I am going to go make myself that rice I talked about and give you some time to think, if you want me to when I’m done I can stick you in the rice” your mum says licking her lips as she walks into the kitchen

You stand there thinking about your final choice Your mum was dying to eat you even right after you were under her humid feet, then your mum made it sound like your sister Anita would enjoy you as an office snack, then your mums friend Emma sounded like she wanted to have you even more than your mum,

your mum comes back from the kitchen while she lets the rice boil as she waits for you to make a decision
1143.title: You don’t want to end up in some stranger’s...

choices: "...I'll throw you out the window!"
"...you're not eating for two days!"
"...you'll have to clean my feet too!"
"...I'm going to hurt your friend Sam!"
You give in and do what she says...
14.content:
Suddenly, a clicking noise comes from your door and it bursts open, the sight before you is shocking: a girl with long blonde hair who looked to be about 10... and was about 3 feet taller than you! What on Earth is going on!?
"Hey, bro!" she giggles, rushing over to you. "Mum's awake, she wants you to go clean her feet."
"W-w-what?" you manage, struggling to process the whole situation. "First of all, why the hell do I have to clean her feet!? Secondly, why is my room different? And thirdly, who the hell are you and why are you so tall!?" you shout. The girl looks surprised.
"It's me, Sarah! Your little sister!" she says. "Girls are always taller than boys, anyway! Duh!" she laughs. "Did you hit your head or something?"
"No, I did not! 10 year olds are NOT taller than 19 year olds!" you protest. What on earth is going on!?
"Yes they are!" she replies, slightly annoyed. "Girls ARE taller than boys, and smarter, and stronger. Now go clean mum's feet!"
"Don't tell me what to do!" you yell. To your horror, Sarah suddenly grabs you by the arms and slams you up against the wall, lifting you so that your eyes are level with her huge face.
"Don't argue with me!" she screams, hot air from her nostrils battering your face as she stares at you, seething with anger. "Or I'll have to punish you!"
She's surprisingly strong, and you can't move in her grip. Whatever the hell is going on, you don't like it...

Just then, you notice an even taller female duck under your doorway and enter your room. She must be near 20 feet tall... it's your mum!!
"Come on, Guy. Listen to your sister or I'll have to let her punish you." she orders.
"Mum!? What happened!?" you shout in terror. "And why do I have to listen to her!? She's younger than me!"
"You need to improve your attitude, young man." she says sternly, approaching you slowly. "You need to wash my feet like you do every morning, is that such a problem?"
"Can someone just tell me what the hell is happening?" you request, going red with rage. Your 'sister' you don't actually know grins evilly at you.
"Do what she says." she demands. "Or else..."
14.title: What? Who? WHY!?

choices: Slump down in defeat and agree to wash your mom's feet.
Still refuse.  No food or drink for you.
Refuse and run away!
142.content:
"What? You're not the boss of me you can't say I can't eat!"

Your sister laughs, "Wow did you hit your head or something bro?"

Your incredibly tall mother says, "Guy, apologize to your sister right now and come wash my feet. And you will not be allowed to eat or drink for two days if you disobey."

This couldn't be happening. This just couldn't you think to yourself. You look at each of them and then...
142.title: "...you're not eating for two days!"

choices: Your sister wants to punish you some more before you get to school.
You get to school uneventuflly.
Something else happens on the way to school.
1422.content:
"No... this is crazy I'm not going to clean your feet!"

Your mother and your sister look at each other and sigh.

"Young man, now you've done it. I hate having to do this to you my son but I will not tolerate disobedience. Hold him down."

Your sister easily manhandles you and your mother grabs something from the kitchen. Your pinned down and your gigantic mother places some strange duct tape looking adhesive on your mouth. It instantly clamps your mouth shut completely and firmly.

"In two days it will dissolve, until then you will receive no drink or food. If you do somehow manage to pull it off it will rip off the skin and beyond being painful it will leave you horribly scarred for the rest of your life." Your mother was incredibly angry with you, you could see it in her eyes that she meant business. She sighed, "Its too late to properly do my feet today and with that on your mouth I guess I won't have you clean my feet for the next couple of days. Don't think that gets you off the hook though, my feet will be extra dirty when the tape comes off. Before you get to eat or drink real food you're going to eat the dirt and drink the sweat from my feet."

You're eyes widen in horror, you realize now by "clean her feet" she mean she wanted you to use your tongue! Disgusting! You felt sick that your mother would even think about doing something so cruel to you. Jane then claps her hands, "All right you two, get to school."

Your sister grabs you and takes you out the door...
1422.title: Still refuse.  No food or drink for you.

choices: Yes
No
143.content:
"... Or else you'll have to clean my feet to!" Your "sister" giggles.

Your mum looks away in disgust, then said "trust me, you DO NOT want to clean HER feet! I can't even go near them without getting lightheaded! So my advice for you is to clean my feet before she gets mad!"

"Yeah, "bro", don't make me mad!"

Do you?
143.title: "...you'll have to clean my feet too!"

choices: On the way to school, you meet up with Sam.
You get to school where Amy and Jo seem to be waiting for you.
You see your sister beating up some guys from your class on the way to school...
144.content:
"You wouldn't..." you reply nervously, turning to your mum. "Would she?"
"I don't know, Guy." she replies. You glance back at your sister who is wearing an evil smirk.
"Can't you stop her?" you ask. Your mum shakes her head slowly.
"No, Guy, she's a female. She can do whatever she wants." she says sternly. "You know that."
"No, no I don't! You can't just be allowed to go round hurting people!" you yell. Your sister gets bored and leaves your room.
"Bored of waiting. Going to hurt Sam. See you later!" she giggles.
"Hey, get back here!" you shout, pursuing her. But suddenly your mum grabs your arm, preventing you from escaping.
"What's gotten into you today!?" she asks. "You clean my feet every morning, what's the problem today?"
"No, I never do!" you complain, deciding to play along with the fact that she's now huge. "Why can't you get dad to do it anyway?"
She shakes her head. "Don'r be silly, Guy. You know he's unconscious right now."
This can't be good. "Why...?" you ask nervously.

She suddenly stands to her full height, bending over a little to avoid hitting the ceiling. It was truly intimidating. "You know your mum ties him to the bed." she explains. "You see, I need sex but he's not always willing to give."
"Ew, mum! I didn't need to hear that!" you grimace. She was not normally so comfortable talking about such things with you. Besides, doesn't what she described count as rape or something?
"Anyway, you're spending too long arguing so I'm going to go clean my feet myself." she says. "But you're getting punished later. Now get ready for school."
Great, you can't wait for school with the new larger females. You can think of a few people who might be worth avoiding at their new sizes...
144.title: A Friend in Danger

choices: Let you "get to know" their feet...
Show you to some more of their friends...
Beat you up...
1442.content:
Grabbing your coat and bag which were unchanged, you quickly leave the house and head to school. You can't help but notice all the females that are so much taller than you. Luckily you don't bump into anyone you know and everyone else pretty much ignores you. The sight of a 7ft tall 6 year old girl happily beating up her father in the middle of the street is horrifying to you. You feel sorry for the man being humiliated as his giant daughter stomps on his head and even kicks him in the privates several times, laughing all the while. Females were being raised like this!?

Walking more quickly now, you finally reach your school. But something looks a little different. There are a lot more girls around than boys, and the school looks a slightly different colour. Usually coloured shades of green, the colour scheme now seems to be a light purple against a pitch black colour. Also there is some weird coat of arms you don't recognise on the school's sign. It has two symbols in the middle that look Japanese and a Latin motto reading "Procerus Puella Sceptrum Terrarum". Your school never had a motto like that! The only similarity is the "est. 1875" bit.

"Hey, Guy!" you hear from behind you. Turning round to check the source of the feminine voice, you come face to face with the bronze tanned thigh of a very tall female. You look up and see the face of a girl towering about 20 feet tall looking down at you with a grin. You don't recognise her, but you recognise the girl she is with who is several feet shorter. She is Jo, someone from your year who is in a few of your classes but hardly knows you. She is giving you a similar malevolent grin.

"Fancy working for us today?" the girl you don't know says.
"Nope, you wish," you reply bravely. The girl adopts a more confident posture, standing up straight and sticking her chest out.
"Wrong answer!" she says, briefly adjusting her perfectly straight blonde hair. Her bare foot suddenly connects with her stomach, knocking you painfully onto your back. "Now, I'll ask you again. Want to work for us today?"
"What if I say no?" you reply daringly.
"We'll have to think of a punishment, right Amy?" Jo cuts in with a smirk. "Like we could shrink him and eat him...!"
"Haha, maybe, Jo. You're obsessed with eating!" Amy chuckles."But the shrinking part sounded good...!"
"That's ridiculous!" you interrupt. "You can't shrink people! It's physically impossible!"
Suddenly an odd feeling comes over you. You try to get up but Amy's huge foot holds you down.
"STAY!" she shouts, stomping on you. You can't believe how much it hurts! You'd better obey her for now, you decide. But suddenly you notice her foot getting a little bigger... glancing over at Jo, you notice her growing too! It's you who is diminishing in size! Once you reach about 3 feet tall, your shrinking stops.
"Get up," Amy orders. You quickly obey, noticing that at your full height now you don't even reach her knee.
"Now we're going to have some fun with you!" Jo chimes in, looking at you hungrily and licking her lips. "And if you don't play along, well..."
She gestures towards her midriff and a loud rumble emerges from it. They both laugh at your plight, and Amy prods you with her big toe. They decide to...
1442.title: Involuntary Rendezvous

choices: Let's invite Katie Nora and Laura for this
Let's make him drown in our foot sweat
14422.content:
They take you into a room to show you to their friends. After a few minutes; their friends Meredith and Gwen walk into the room. "Oh man, that's so cool. What can we do with him?" asked Gwen. You look up at the four giant girls staring down at you. After a few seconds, Meredith said, "You know what, why don't we make him smell our feet. Gwen and I just got done jogging and I can feel my feet swimming in sweat in my shoes. And I know you two don't need to try hard to get your feet stinky." "Shut up Mere" Jo said laughing. "Alright, lets do it."

The four girls remove their shoes and the smell hits you instantaneously. As the girls place their feet on your body. The lack of fresh air makes you dizzy and you begin losing consciousness. The last thing you heard them say before you pass out was...
14422.title: Show you to some more of their friends...

choices: You decide to just walk away & try to avoid any conflicts.
You decide to try getting on your sister's good side & help her beat them up.
You decide to stick up for your kind & oppose your intimidating younger sister.
1443.content:
As you walk to school, you see your 8 foot tall sister beating the crap out of a group of small teenage boys! You don't know what's going on, but you quickly approach the scene to find out.

"Sis, what the heck are you doing?!"

"What does it look like I'm doing, twerp! I'm beating some sense into these stupid boys, who clearly don't know their place!"

"Why?! What did they even do to you?"

"Listen squirt, it doesn't matter what they did! The fact of the matter is that I'm a girl, and they're boys! That means that I'm better than them, and I can do whatever I want to them!"

"But that's just messed up! You can't just go beating up people for no reason!"

"Oh, I can't? Last I checked, girls were the ones in charge of this world! I don't think that you have any right to tell me what I can and can't do, boy! Now you better get this through your thick head: I've been trying to be nice to you because you're my brother, but you've been acting really weird since morning. I don't know if you hit your head or something, but you need to know your place! Girls are better than boys in every way, and you have no say in what we chose to do with you! Now either you help me beat these worthless guys up, or you just walk away right now and get to school. Otherwise I'm going to have to teach you a lesson, 'little' brother."

This is really starting to scare you. Something in your gut told you that your sister wasn't just joking around. She really would beat you up too if you got in her way! Still, could you really just leave and let her continue beating these apparently helpless boys senseless?!


What will you do?
1443.title: Are you with her, or against her?

choices: You get to school without any issues, and the day proceeds as usual.
Befor you can get to school, you are cut off by Amy and a group of other girls!
14431.content:
As you look up at your towering sister, you quickly realize that you couldn't do anything to help these boys out even if you did decide to oppose her. She could easily walk all over you if you got on her bad side, and the last thing you wanted was to get beaten down by this 10 year old titaness. And now that you thought about it, this fight of hers really didn't have anything to do with you in the first place. It's obvious to you that it would be better to just leave your sister to her business and not annoy her.

"Okay, sis! Sheesh... I'm sorry for getting in your way, but there's no reason to attack me too! I'll just be on my way now... Have fun with your little friends there..."

Sarah's face quickly shifts from the irritated frown she had on earlier to a cheerful smile. She simply giggles at your change of heart.

"Smart choice little bro. I didn't want to have to hurt you, but you really should know better than to try and mess with me. Now I think that you should hurry up and get to school, or else your gonna be late."

You sigh in relief before looking up at your sister's smiling face. You smile back at her, and then give her a thumbs-up.

"Hey, no need to tell me twice! I guess I'll see ya later sis..."

"Yep, see ya bro!"

You then begin to walk away. You only look back once, and you see that Sarah has already resumed her beating of the boys. She was attacking them with the skills of a 3rd degree black belt, and you were amazed at how powerful she was. She would have been able to take on the group of boys easily, even if she was the same size as them! Her incredible fighting skill, coupled with her vastly superior size, made it obvious that those boys didn't stand a ghost of a chance against her. You simply shiver in fear as you think that you had almost become another target for that fighting machine of a girl to take down.

"Yeesh! I'm sure glad that I didn't try to get in her way..."

You continue to walk toward school, hoping that nothing else happens.

What happens next?
14431.title: Getting on your way

choices: The blonde girl (Amy) picks you up with a malicious smile on her face...
Jo wants a snack, and eyes you voraciously...
144312.content:
Walking away from the horrifying cries of pain arising from behind you as quickly as you can, you glance over your shoulder to see your giant sister digging her heel into one of the boys' crotches with a huge smile on her face. On any other normal day, she would be deemed a psychopath, restrained with a straitjacket and thrown into a padded cell for the rest of her life. But apparently today she could get away with being a sadistic freak and even encouraged, you decide as you notice one of her friends joining in the fun. You really wanted to help the poor guys, but if you had done that you probably would've felt the worst pain you've ever felt.

No longer able to watch your monster of a sister, you turn your head round and almost immediately afterwards you crash into a thick, fleshy, almost tree-trunk-like object. You rebound from the impact, your legs collapsing under you as you spiral to the ground. The hefty smack as you hit the concrete pavement rattles your skull and blinds you for a few seconds.
"Watch where you're going, you little wimp!" a voice calls from above. Judging by the tone of the voice and how it sounds like it's coming from about 20 feet above you, you decide it's almost certainly an intimidating female towering over you. Again.
Simply opening your eyes proves this theory right: a beautiful girl about your age stands over you wearing a scary look on her stunning visage. She looks a lot more menacing than your sister did but she doesn't scare you as much. Probably because the thought of being beaten senseless by a girl 9 years younger and almost 3 feet taller than you was too much to bear.

"Get up!" the voice demands as the girl prods you with one of her large toes. You roll over, rubbing your eyes, and notice three girls towering over you rather than just the one. You only recognise one of them: Jo, the girl who is the middle heighted of the three. You'd seen her around before but you don't really know anything about her other than that whenever someone sees her she seems to be tucking into some form of food, yet she still maintains an attractive, slim body. She has chocolate brown hair and is coincidentally eating a bar of chocolate as she looks mockingly down at you from maybe 16ft above.
The second girl is one you don't know and is the shortest of the three, at about 13 or 14ft tall by your estimate. She's a little heavier than Jo but she has gorgeous curves and a juicy butt that resembles a pair of beach balls hidden under her skirt. Not that this is the time to be checking her out, you decide as she scowls at you. She must be another person you are supposed to know, like your sister.
The third girl is the tallest by several feet: the one whose leg blocked your path. With smooth, pale blonde hair reaching the length of her elbows with her arms at her sides, a beautiful face with an evil grin and a body to die for, she is probably the sexiest girl you've ever seen. Literally flawless. Glancing nervously at her feet, you feel a hard-on forming as she wriggles her cute toes. You'd always had a slight weak spot for female feet, maybe not so much that you'd be able to call it a foot fetish. But if you didn't have one before, you do now. Everything about the girl, including her feet, has a weird sense of perfection emanating from it. Almost as if she's some sort of goddess.

"Get up!" the tall blonde shouts once again but with more annoyance in her voice this time. "Didn't you hear me the first time, you little shit!?"
Terrified, you scramble to your feet and find yourself at the level of the girl's knee once again. She makes your sister look like a midget! But what does that make you...!?
"W-who are you?" you ask with a trembling voice, not even remembering deciding to say those words.
"Did I say you could speak?" the blonde snaps. "Disobey me, Jo or Louise again and I'll make you wish you were never fucking born!"
Well now you know the names of two of the girls, but that's hardly going to help. You stand there awkwardly for a few moments as the girls whisper to each other, and suddenly...
144312.title: Psycho Sis

choices: Worship Amy's feet
Run away
1443122.content: As Jo bent over to pick you up, you start trying to run. Because of your speed you managed to out manuever Jo who was a rather big of a klutz. As Jo scrambled around to try and catch you, the shortest of the girls suddenly started to try and help Jo catch you. But you are just too fast as you started to run in circles around them. Feeling good, you thought you had a chance as Jo managed to trip over and fell. As you started to run towards school, the shortest of the three girls tripped over Jo and fell too. As you continued sprinting away you looked back and saw the two giant girls laying on the ground in a tangled mess. Once again, you laughed to yourself at how you managed to defeat two giantesses using your wits. Suddenly you realize that the tallest blonde girl, Amy was missing, but you paid it no heed as you turned around and kept running. However as you turned around you bump right into Amy's sole. She was waiting for you sitting down with her long legs ectended. Her long strides allowed her to catch up to you and when you had turned around she was getting ready for you. As you smashed into what you at first thought was a soft wall turned out to be Amy's feet. As the impact against the large object knocked me to my butt as I looked up all I saw were beautiful giant feet. Then Amy wiggled her toes and told me to worship her feet or else.
1443122.title: Jo wants a snack, and eyes you voraciously...

choices: You land on your sister somewhere- safety!
You hit the concrete- pain!
14433.content:
You consider turning around and walking away. Really. You do. This girl, this "sister", can clearly kick your ass without physical or mental reservation, and if you don't want to get hurt, it would be the smart thing to do. You can't bring yourself to do it, though- all those years of society's messages, of sticking up for what needs to be upheld... where were they? Someone had to do something...

But the beating... you look at the group of boys with bruises and bleeds that look REALLY serious and painful. They don't say a word, they just groan miserably... maybe you should retreat...

Caught in this little tug of war between ideals and safety, you are suddenly shaken out of it when you recognize two men in the group.

The first is your friend, Sam, who you've partnered with for years. He's on the ground and got a nasty bend in his leg. The second is your brother, Ali, whose glasses are gone and who is stumbling in circles with a bleeding mouth and nose.

If there was ever any value to those stupid ethics, you know what you should do. And really... who wants to live forever?

Sarah is rearing back her fist for another punch when you rush from behind and wrap your arms around her legs. She lets out a confused "What the..." as you yell to the others "RUN! HURRY!"

You can't imagine what your sister's face is like at this moment, but it must be really bad, because you can hear them scampering faster than you ever thought boys in their condition could.

For a second, time stands still. You stand there in a ridiculous wrap around her legs, no idea what's going to happen next. Then, slowly, slowly, she bends down, easily pulls your arms off from around her thighs, and pulls you with one arm in front of her. You can't move. Your legs are shaking. You're completely paralyzed with fear.

She looks down at you with an expression that could freeze a volcano. Then she reaches under your armpits, grabs you with both hands (none too tightly,) and lifts you up to her eye-level.

It's then that the falling feeling kicks in. You think for a second you've been dropped, but you realize that she's still holding onto you. It's only as the hands which clench you shift and the ground goes further and further away that you realize what's happening: you're shrinking.

In less than half a minute, each of her hands are as wide as your torso, and still growing. You have completely lost all feeling below the waist as her silently furious expression starts rising above you, higher, and higher, and higher...

Your legs no longer extend below her fingers, so she shifts you a bit more to grab you in one hand and place you in the other. Then she keeps on shrinking you. Her palm extends outward, constantly, and you wonder if she's ever going to stop...

She does. You sit in her palm like a massive beige, ridge-covered parking lot. You collapse on the "ground" that is her skin, never breaking your stare with her gigantic face. To you, it's now hundreds of feet wide, and every single square inch reads the same message.

Her message comes out in a low voice, but still loud for you. "GIVE ME ONE REASON I SHOULDN'T KILL YOU RIGHT NOW, YOU LITTLE BUG."

You can't say a word, but you're pretty certain at this point that you've wet yourself.

The silence remains between you two for ages, then you're aware of a voice sounding in the distance a message you can't make out. "COMING!" Your sister bellows, blowing out your eardrums.

She looks at you again for another few seconds, then suddenly the world tips...

As you roll to the edge of the palm, you have just enough time to realize you're being dumped before you're in the air a relative thousand feet above the ground.

If you're mind weren't in a state of complete panic, you would've thought how strange it was. You never could have guessed your final sights before the end would be a gigantic living creature representing the sister you don't have in the world you don't belong.

Her face is impassive as it pulls away...
14433.title: Bravery is stupid.

choices: With your Tongue obviously
With a bucket filled with my spit and your hands  in the corner
A sponge and bucket, it's in the bathroom.
145.content:
"Okay" you say interrupting your sister. "I'll wash your feet, then I gue..." your cut off by an extremely painful slap which sends you spiralling across the room. As you lay there sprawled out your sister angrily stands over you. Don't you ever! Ever! Interrupt me you pathetic little boy!" she screams at you hitting you with rather large pieces of spit. She turns on her heel angrily and storms out of the room.
"I don't know why your acting so strange today, but you should never be so rude to a woman like that again" she says calmly. You cheeks burn red, mostly from the slap but part of you feels so demeaned and humiliated. "Well guy, better not wait any longer" she says as she plops herself down on your floor. She sticks out her feet and you see why they need cleaning every morning. The bottom of her foot is caked in mud, dust and general rubbish while her heel is cracking and filled with similar unpleasantries. Looking around for a sponge and bucket you don't see one. "How do I clean it again?"
Looking exasperated she replie
145.title: You give in and do what she says...

info.brief_description: One day you wake up and find everything different to how you remember... how do you react?
info.description:
This story is about an 19 year old guy called Guy (no pun intended!). As in most of my interactives, he's pretty normal. He has short blonde hair, an exercised body, and blue eyes. He enjoys playing sports with his friends on weekends. Like I said, he's pretty normal. But one day, he wakes up and something seems different...

Basically, he has somehow entered a new reality in his sleep in which females pretty much rule. They're born taller, stronger and smarter than males and the laws of society put them in control. Guy notices some things which are different in this new reality:
*The average height of females his age seems to range between 11 feet and 23 feet approximately. Guy himself is 5ft 5, which is short in his original reality but tall among males in his new reality. The height of males his age in the new reality is roughly between 5ft 7 and 3ft 2.
*For some reason, females in this reality rarely ever wear anything on their feet. They just get a nearby male to tend to their feet if needed.
*International law states that males must do whatever a female tells him to, punishable by anything, including death.
*Females seem to have no moral objections to the way men are treated.
*At schools, there is a 15 minute break after every lesson during which females often 'spend time' with their male slaves.
*The average height for a male Guy's age seems to be about 5ft. A female reaches 5ft at about the age of 5, and by the time they're 19 they are normally 11ft or taller. This often results in fathers not being able to control their female children.
*Females appear to be able to shrink males. Shrunken males have become a popular delicacy in recent times.
*There are virtually no taboos, meaning females have no problem talking about things like sex in public.

Sorry about the long intro, but allow me to introduce the characters of the story (the new reality versions):
Guy: age 19, height 5ft 5. you already know about him.
Sam: Age 19, height 5ft 4. Guy's best friend. They've known each other since the age of 3. Sam's brother was killed last year by his ex-girlfriend, so he hates basically all females.
Alastair (Ali): Age 11, height 5ft, Guy's brother. He has very bad eyesight and often gets picked on for his glasses. He's a bit nerdy but intelligent for his age.
Sarah: Age 10, height 8ft, Guy's sister. Guy had no sisters in the past reality, so he doesn't know her, which could make for some awkward
moments. She has long blonde hair and is quite bossy.
Anita: Age 24, height 15ft 6, Guy's older sister. She lives out of the house and has a busy work life as a businesswoman.
Jane: Age 37, height 17ft 3, Guy's mother. Long, wavy brunette hair and a great body. She keeps her husband (Guy's father) locked in her bedroom and rarely lets him out.
Louise: Age 17, height 13ft 7, Sam's brother's ex-girlfriend. She killed Sam's brother a year ago in a bout of rage, so Sam now hates her with a passion. There is, however, no penalty in the new reality for females killing males.
Amy: Age 18, height 20ft 2, a girl from Guy & Sam's school who is tall for her age. She is very vain, keeping her pale blonde hair straightened at all times and her makeup immaculate. She is very powerful among her peers and very dominant of males. She also has an amazing body.
Emma: Age 36, height 17ft 5, redhead. She is Guy's mother's friend, and for some reason enjoys coming to Guy's house to tease him.
Josephine (Jo): Age 19, height 16ft 9, friends with Amy. She eats all the time but somehow manages to stay slim. Guy doesn't really know her.
Tabitha (Tabby), Age 18, height 19ft 6, brown hair. Another girl at your school who in normal life is just an ordinary girl, but in the new reality is basically a she-hulk. She has some of the biggest muscles you'll ever see on either sex and breaks peoples bones for fun. She's not the smartest girl, however.


And finally for the rules:
-No weight gain
-No male interaction (female interaction is okay)
-No growth (females can't grow, they can shrink males)
-No shrinking females
-Please use good spelling, grammar and try to write chapters longer than a few sentences.
-Try to use all options available when possible.
-Write in second person present tense (You go, You see, she says, etc)
-Body part expansion is permitted (butt, breasts, muscles, whatever)
-Feet stuff is fine
-Vore is fine

And that's it! Have fun!
-Willum
